content: >***have you cast on this pattern *** we love to see your projects tag your photos on instagram with **#mysweetpaprikaproject** to enter our monthly giveaway for a chance to win a **$25 gift card** for www sweetpaprikadesigns com 1 see details here 2 a twisted rib cuff and simple pinstripe pattern give a little texture to these socks which works particularly well with the colour variegation in our pizzicato sock yarn the socks are worked from the top down with a heel flap **size** woman s medium **finished measurements** leg circumference 7½ foot circumference 7¼ foot length 9 or desired length **yarn** fingering weight yarn 285 yds shown in sweet paprika pizzicato 3 80% superwash blue-faced leicester wool 20% nylon 115g/412 yds 1 skein palestra **needles** size 2 2 75mm set of 4 dpns **notions** yarn needle **gauge** 16 sts and 24 rnds = 2 in pinstripe pattern worked in the round 1 https //www sweetpaprikadesigns com utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=monthly_giveaway 2 https //bit ly/space-iggivaway 3 https //www sweetpaprikadesigns com/products/pizzicato utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=rav
